Name: Blue Rabbit
About the game: You find yourself in a futuristic dystopian city. You get the idea: Dark smog. A rogue A.I. Corporate drones. Actual, literal drones. The whole enchilada. In this fast-paced 2D platformer, you play as Arisu, a Runner tasked to deliver the ambiguous Blue Rabbit 'packages'. Traverse the roofs of giant skyscrapers and explore the dangerous metropolis. Unlock upgrades in order to uncover new areas. Features Fast-paced 2D platforming and combat. Unlockable upgrades. Explore a futuristic city. High contrast mode for the visually impaired.
